document.full_text: to the long list of rich-guy foibles that turned into defining campaign moments, let us now add newt gingrich's $500,000 revolving line of credit at tiffany.
document.title: political memo: all that glitters may redefine run by gingrich
lines_and_colors: to the long list of rich-guy foibles that turned into defining campaign moments, let us now add newt gingrich's $500,000 revolving line of credit at tiffany.
